name: Devious Runner
description:
Devious Runner is a nostalgic, fantasy-themed endless runner designed to test your skills. Earn Purple Gems to unlock new characters as you play through the hazardous course- but don't let the Demon Keeper catch you! You'll have to fight off additional foes as you navigate the course.  Use your trusted weapon and the Red Gems you collect to fight back! Maintain your three lives long enough to evade the villainous Demon Keeper and set a new high score.

Are you up to the challenge & ready to escape your demons?
